tool_description: Returns the weather data scrapped from websites
name: Live Weather Data
title: Live Weather Data

api_list.name: Weather Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-weather-data.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-weather-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-weather-data.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-weather-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
